attributes.action: allow vulnerable people to carry non lethal pepper spray for self defence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In France and many other countries, people are allowed to buy and carry pepper spray. It is non lethal, and has no lasting effects. There are many vulnerable people in our society that could benefit by being able to defend themselves.
We should not be dissuaded by the concern that criminals may use use pepper spray to commit crime, because that would be preferable to their use of other more lethal weapons.
The British people are just as trustworthy as those in France and in other countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
